summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Park Place (Ballard) now Doc Place between the westerly line of Ballard Avenue to the easterly line of Shilshole Avenue in the City of Seattle, by grading & paving under Ordinance No. 1235, creating Local Improvement District No. B-155 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
